TopicTitle: Mod to maintain angle of attack with shuttles ?

Articles.Content:
Title is pretty self-explanatory: is there any mod out there that allows to set a definite angle of attack for a shuttle/spaceplane during reentry, so that SAS maintains your craft at this AoA ?

I know MechJeb does that (I think so), and I know you can configure kOS to do it; but I still would like to know another mod which does this specifically.

21 hours ago, Gaarst said:

There is Pilot's Assistant, but it doesn't work well always in vacuum and upper atmosphere. Depends on spacecraft. Author said he will try to fix it on the next update. But in any case, it's worth a try. In most cases, it works better than MechJeb. But for the upper atmosphere, MechJeb works better at this time - at least in my experience.
